name: Mix and Match with Maggie
description:
The game is one of a series of educational titles from Scetlander, dedicated to children under 5 years: with the help of Maggie the Loch Ness monster as the host, they are to learn how to match different objects together.

There are three major mini-game modes available: "Two of a Kind" (matching pictures, shapes, letters or numbers), "Odd One Out" (identifying the odd picture, shape, letter or number), "Forget-me-not" (pictures, shapes, letters or numbers are being 'flashed' on screen - after that the correct match has to be identified), as well as "Clock and Calendar" mode (which just displays the internal clock and calendar in either digital or analogue form).
alsoFor: Amiga, Atari ST, DOS, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
